Verb *apply*
*************

Documentation for the apply verb in */cmds/verbs/apply.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``apply <something> to <something>``
 |  ``apply bandage to left arm``
 |  ``apply for drivers license``

For applying things to things or for things.
